creditline: Gift of Kenneth and Sally Leafman Appelbaum
description: cone-shaped base (may be tzedakah box?) with open basketweave designs and lions; thin stem with 4 pairs of arms plus one bottom central arm; arm pairs rotate; cupola-like finial; 9 large gold-plated cups, 5 small gold-plated candle cups; 10 candle cup holders and 39 glass cups of 2 different types included
markings: on bottom, stamped: [SILVER/ (lion)/ ME/ (sack)/ HANDMADE/ BY M ENDE/ ISRAEL]
title: Hanukkah lamp
